actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide additional appropriations for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 for fiscal year 2006 and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for residential energy cost assistance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Household Energy and Taxpayer Assistance Act of 2005

summary.text:
Household Energy and Taxpayer Assistance Act of 2005 - Provides additional appropriations for the low-income home energy assistance program for FY2006.

Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a refundable tax credit for 20% of their residential energy expenses. Imposes a $200 lifetime limitation on such credit ($300 for joint returns).
